class.rdfs:comment: A structured value representing the duration and scope of services that will be provided to a customer free of charge in case of a defect or malfunction of a product.
class.rdfs:label: WarrantyPromise

schema:durationOfWarranty.rdfs:comment: The duration of the warranty promise. Common unitCode values are ANN for year, MON for months, or DAY for days.
schema:durationOfWarranty.rdfs:label: durationOfWarranty

schema:warrantyScope.rdfs:comment: The scope of the warranty promise.
schema:warrantyScope.rdfs:label: warrantyScope
